answers.answer: 25 days left over here. If he don't come on his own we will induce at 39 so 19 days!! I'm excited this is my 3rd and it's been 6 years since I've had s baby do its like starting all over but I'm so anxious to meet him. I'm feeling good other than heart burn and being very crampy.

Only 32 days left here! I'm expecting my little girl soon but these last few days have been so rough! Every time i stand i get bad contractions and i STILL have morning sickness some days! But I'm sooo excited to meet my little one i can't wait anymore!
Yeah I've also been having some mild contractions the past week or so. Feel like mybaby had dropped some already, anyone else feel that way?
30 days left I can't wait to meet my prince. Doctors think he coming early I'm hoping because these last few days have been the worst out of the whole pregnancy.

Oh yes my boy dropped weeks ago. I get lots of contractions.  I actually was going to go in Monday night because I thought he was ready to come but I ended up just going to sleep. I was 1 cm last week I'll find out tomorrow if I'm any more dialted after all the contractions I had I'm hoping so.

question: How are you ladies feeling? Sometimes I get worried because I don't feel my baby move as much. I have my ultrasound on Friday to do measurements because of my diabetes, she is measuring a bit big. I'm getting so anxious to have her already lol.
title: 36 days or less to go! September mommies yay!
